metaDescription: Portfolio of Wendell Araújo, a Full Stack Developer with experience in modern web projects.
aboutGreeting: Hi! My name is Wendell Araújo, and I'm a Full Stack Developer passionate about technology, design, and innovation.
aboutMission: I help companies and professionals transform ideas into modern, fast, and efficient digital solutions.
specialtyFrontend: Front-end development with Angular and Lit, creating modern, accessible, and responsive interfaces;
specialtyBackend: Back-end development with .NET (C#) and MySQL, ensuring stable and scalable systems;
specialtyIntegration: API and database integration, connecting services and functionalities securely and efficiently;
specialtyDesignSystems: Creating and maintaining Design Systems, focusing on standardization, component reuse, and visual consistency.
aboutEducation: I am a student of Information Technology Management at Faculdade Uníntese and I am always improving my skills in UI/UX, code best practices, and new technologies that enhance application quality.
aboutHobbies: In my spare time, I enjoy exploring new languages, tools, and concepts that broaden my perspective on web development.
aboutInvitation: If you are looking for a dedicated, analytical, and creative developer to turn your idea into a solid, high-impact digital product — let's talk!
skillsText: These are some of the technologies I have experience with:
projectsText: These are some of my main works. Click to see the details.
projectsPageText: Here you will find a list of most of my works.
